parsed.internal_thinking: Alice has claimed Node 20 (W11, B6, S8), a solid 12-pip start with good expansion potential. My goal is to secure high production and rare resources. Ore is quite scarce on this board, with the only high-probability hex being Ore 5 (H17). Node 42 (Wh9, O5, Wh9) is an exceptional choice with 12 total pips (4+4+4). It secures the best Ore income and dominates a high-yield cluster. Strategically, building on Node 42 also blocks Node 43 (the board's highest production at 13 pips, Wh9-Wh6-Wh9) and Node 41 (11 pips, O5-Wh9-B10), significantly limiting my opponents' options in the bottom-right quadrant. While I will initially lack Wood and Brick, I plan to address this with my second settlement (the 5th pick in the draft), likely targeting Node 11 or 31 to balance my resource income for early expansion. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Claimed the best Ore/Wheat cluster at Node 42. Need to target Wood and Brick with the second settlement (5th pick overall). Watch Node 11 (B6, S5, W12) and Node 31 (Wh9, B10, W11) as potential second spots. Alice is moving toward the Brick 10 at H8.
parsed.say_outloud: Nice spot, Alice! That 6-8-11 is definitely hard to pass up. I think I'll settle in down south at Node 42 and see if I can't get some of that Ore and Wheat production going. Good luck to both of you!
